ygData.subject: Re: Back to Innoruuk
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah Lan ai!! , U should have send the mail yesterday man :) Just got a glowing crook from Yiyang *kissing his feets* and sold off my RTS . Trifrost The Bear
ygData.messageBody:
Wah Lan ai!! , U should have send the mail yesterday man :)
Just got a glowing crook from Yiyang *kissing his feets* and sold off my RTS .

Trifrost The Bear Shaman

Leshrec wrote:

> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>
> Alamak I also using almost full cloth armor lah. Woven very ex when those
> smelly trolls sell them and the only one i got was a mask which i bought for
> 5pp from a wooden elf. As for the magical staff, u can try to get high level
> magicians to sell u a summon one. Most of them would do it for free, but be
> prepared to pay a few gold for them. They are almost same stats as the great
> staff, but magical and nosave. I will try to get you the staff, and i think
> should be easier cos its pending lore and no one would want to get stuck
> with them. bbc is Bone bladed claymore. Its quite sucky actually, -agility i
> think. Only good thing bout it its its damage cos its a 2hander.
